item.name: ok, hr, chilled - tonne and fahrenheit

request.description:
Requires existence of previously created cargo identifier.

The easiest way is to execute one of "book-cargo, success" requests on commandside.

They will set "execution_receivedCargoIdentifier" collection variable required by this request.
